areYouSureDeleteDatabase: Are you sure you want to delete the vector DB "{{dbName}}"?
areYouSureDeleteChat: Are you sure you want to delete the chat "{{chatName}}"?
databaseDescriptionPlaceholder: Example: A database for searching information on XXX.
chunkSizeTooltip: The length of each chunk when splitting the text.
overlapPercentageTooltip: The percentage of text shared between adjacent chunks.
startingDatabaseCreation: Starting the creation of the vector DB...
databaseCreationFailed: Failed to create the vector DB.
databaseCreationFailedWithMessage: Failed to create the vector DB: {{message}}
startingDocumentAddition: Starting to add documents to the vector DB...
documentAdditionSuccessfully: Documents added successfully to the vector DB "{{dbName}}".
documentAdditionFailed: Failed to add documents to the vector DB.
documentAdditionFailedWithMessage: Failed to add documents to the vector DB: {{message}}
vectorDBSavePathTooltip: Sets the folder where the vector DB will be saved.
chatDataSavePathTooltip: Sets the folder where chat history will be saved.
folderDepthTooltip: Sets the number of levels to recursively read folders.
systemMessagePlaceholderDescription: This text controls the response style of the model. {{DOCUMENTS}} will be replaced with search results and {{TOPIC}} will be replaced with the set topic when making a request to the model.
systemMessagePlaceholderDummy:
### Result 1
**Source:** Example Source
**Content:** This is an example content.
**Score:** 0.85
---
### Result 2
**Source:** Another Source
**Content:** This is another example content.
**Score:** 0.78
topicDescription: Setting the direction and background information of the chat in advance can make it easier to get the desired response.
topicPlaceholderDummy: The topic entered in the topic settings section will be inserted here.
topicPlaceholderExample: Example: In this chat, we will discuss the market research for a new product. The main focus will be on consumer opinions and competitive product analysis.
temperatureTooltip: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
maxTokensTooltip: Specifies the maximum number of tokens to generate in the output.
searchResultsLimitTooltip: Limits the number of search results returned.
errorRetryingMessage: Failed to retry sending the message.
useSeparateVenders: Use separate vendor for embeddings model
